problems.title: Battery Flashing Blue / Won't Charge
problems.description: Charger flashes blue rapidly or battery holds no charge.
solution_steps: The Linx battery (Fade-Free Lithium) is known to fail after 2-3 years.

problems.title: No Suction / Dirt falling out
solution_steps: Pull out the sponge filter and wash it.
Clear the orange baffle tube in the dirt cup.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the battery on a Linx Cordless Stick Vacuum (BH50010)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement battery typically costs significantly less than a new $357 vacuum, and extending the life of your Hoover is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Linx Cordless Stick Vacuum (BH50010) needs a new battery?
faqs.answer: Common signs include strange noises and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the battery on my Linx Cordless Stick Vacuum (BH50010) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
